problem.p: Given a random poker hand of 5 cards from a standard 52-card deck, find the probability that

ul.li: all cards are at least 7 (i.e., 7, 8, ..., K, A - note that we count the Ace as a high card) given that the hand contains at least one face card (i.e. J,Q,K),
the hand contains exactly two suits given that it contains exactly one queen.
